OfficeLink (cs.officelink): 15.5.0
  • Docs »
  • History
  • View page source

History¶

15.5.0.9¶

  • Bugfix [E048456]: Exception in cs.officelink when creating serverside PDF PowerReports

15.5.0.8¶

  • Bugfix [E047826]: DCS/Metadata sync: Conversion job fails when a document variable references an object without ‘cdb_classname’ attribute
  • Bugfix [E047826]: DCS/Metadata sync: Conversion job fails when new config file ‘etc/officelink.conf’ is missing
  • Bugfix [E047836]: PDF converter option _shellexecute not working when running DCS server in VM
  • Bugfix [E047737]: Docs: Use english code example comments (instead of german)
  • Improvement [E047783]: Extend documentation about DCS server (+ mso plug-in) setup
  • Improvement [E034688]: PowerReports: Document missing mapped attributes in XML schema when only returning relation name instead cdb.objects class via getSchema in CustomProvider
  • Improvement [E017291]: PowerReports: Document how to use a RuleProvider with report dialog and object rule variables
  • Improvement [E047712]: PowerReports: Add default provider parameter “MaxRowsTruncate” (Documentation only; Feature requires CE 15.3 resp. cs.powerreports 15.3.0.1!)
  • Improvement [E015990]: PowerReports: Add provider parameter “OrderBy” for provider type “RuleProvider” (Documentation only; Feature requires CE 15.3 resp. cs.powerreports 15.3.0.1!)

15.5.0.7¶

  • Bugfix [E047598]: Docs: Explain Microsoft Windows usage of “Certificate Revocation List” and its possible slow down of the OfficeLink load time
  • Bugfix [E047586]: PowerPoint: OfficeLink menubar sometimes grayed out when closing presentation mode
  • Bugfix [E038157]: DCS/Ghostscript: Exception when creating bookmarks with non-ASCII characters
  • Bugfix [E047579]: DCS/Ghostscript: pdfconverter.conf option “bookmark_attr” not evaluated
  • Bugfix [E047575]: DCS/Ghostscript/PowerPoint: Exception when creating PDF bookmarks
  • Bugfix [E047387]: OfficeLink 32 bit not installable when Office 64 bit was installed in the past
  • Bugfix [E045907]: PowerReports: CDB hyperlink texts are interpreted as numbers and get modified by Excel (e.g. “0500.330” into “500330”)
  • Bugfix [E047368]: Configuring Excel as a viewer in CDB results in an inactive OfficeLink (e.g. not filled PowerReports)
  • Bugfix [E047358]: Metadata sync: Relationships with empty decsription field (label) can’t be used
  • Bugfix [E034184]: Metadata sync (Word): Document that table headers in footers or headers should be locked via CTRL+F11 for proper PDF conversion
  • Improvement [E020048]: Outlook: Implement add-in side duplicate check for mails (.msg)
  • Improvement [E038346]: Improve error message when edited documented is below a WSM workspace structure
  • Improvement [E034456]: Unhide hidden message dialogs (e.g. “Document has been updated.”) via options dialog
  • Improvement [E038600]: Docs: Info on how to re-enable fully disabled add-in
  • Improvement [E045342]: Docs: Clean up and extend comments in pdfconverter.conf
  • Improvement [E029807]: Support option “PDF/A” for PowerPoint to PDF conversions (pdfconverter.conf)
  • Improvement [E044865]: Metadata sync: Helper button for changing document variable values (Word only)
  • Improvement [E033937]: Skip file format dialog on pressing “Create Document” when file is already locally saved
  • Improvement [E028041]: Metadata-Sync: Improve error handling when writing to non-existing referenced object
  • Improvement [E039448]: Don’t log ERRORs on missing settings in registry
  • Improvement [E040396]: Improve error message on missing CAD configuration “Allow Metadata Manage/Write”
  • Improvement [E044828]: Docs: Add note about disabling antivirus for Outlook conversions
  • Improvement [E044505]: Docs: Add note about general macro settings for PDF conversions (in the Office Trust Center)
  • Change [E047248]: Temporarily remove PDF admin manual

15.5.0.6¶

  • Bugfix [E047256]: PowerReports: Exception with complex row reports and row heights exceeding 409
  • Improvement [E017618]: Visio: Support meta data synchronization
  • Improvement [E044746]: Metadata sync: Disable screen updating in Excel in order to increase performance

15.5.0.5¶

  • Bugfix [E046525]: Exception when creating new document with document class property ‘Filename template’=’cdb_file.cdbf_original_name’
  • Bugfix [E046035]: Metadata sync: Variable property ”.numeric” not working for serverside reading variables
  • Bugfix [E045629]: Move system requirements from OfficeLink docs to Product Support Matrix
  • Bugfix [E018263]: DCS/Metadata sync: Auto fill document variables when converting to PDF
  • Bugfix [E045927]: Excel can not be activated in embedded mode (e.g. activating an Excel sheet in Word)
  • Changed [E045993]: MSPXML: Move cs.officelink.component.OfficeLinkComponent.MSP_UPDATABLE_ATTRIBUTES to cs.pcs.msp.imports.XmlMergeImport.TASK_UPDATABLE_MSP_ATTRS (only for cs.pcs 15.4.2)

15.5.0.4¶

  • Bugfix [E045630]: MSProject: Plan can not be published when task notes contain non-XML-valid characters (e.g. vertical tabs)

15.5.0.3¶

  • Bugfix [E045373]: MSProject: “Update attributes” only working for Text* and Number* fields, not for normal (non-extended) fields
  • Bugfix [E044154]: MSProject (XML): Empty MSP tasks not correctly handled (partly imported as summary tasks)
  • Improvement [E044895]: MSProject: Allow empty tasks (blank rows between two tasks)
  • Improvement [E044770]: Metadata sync: Add default handler for server-side variables

15.5.0.2¶

  • Bugfix [E044362]: PDF converter option _shellexecute not always working
  • Improvement: Update release notes and documentation

15.5.0.1¶

  • Bugfix [E043631]: Metadata Sync (Excel): Variable values not updated when document contains duplicated/orphaned variables
  • Improvement [E043384]: Metadata Sync: Support server side reading/writing of document variable values
